


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->
<!-- @name    linux -->

# ```js linux ```


Check if the app run on linux



## Example (js)

```js
import isLinux from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/linux';
isLinux(); // => true
```
